headline: Ask HN: Why can't cloud providers offer a prepay option?
description:
I am student that currently using azure student, but their free vm has no capacity left in all regions it is the Standard_B1s vm size.

I wouldn't mind putting my credit card in azure to access to bypass the capacity issue, and get their paid vm, but I am worried about messing up, and getting an expensive charge, but is there any reason with cloud providers like azure I can't prepay?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 为什么云供应商不能提供预付费选项？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 為什麼雲供應商不能提供預付費選項？
description_zh-Hans:
我是一名学生，目前正在使用azure学生，但他们的免费虚拟机在所有地区都没有容量，它是标准_B1s虚拟机的大小。

我不介意把我的信用卡放在azure中访问，以绕过容量问题，并获得他们的付费虚拟机，但我担心搞砸了，并得到一个昂贵的费用，但有什么理由像azure这样的云供应商我不能预付费用？
